title: The slope of a line
text: When the line is in $$y=mx+b$$ form, the coefficient of $$x$$ is the slope of the line.
speech: When the line is in  y is equal to, m x plus b  form, the coefficient of  x  is the slope of the line.
pacedSpeech: When the line is in   y is equal to, m x plus b
is the slope of the line.
